instructions.content: Implement proper API versioning strategy (URL path, header, or query parameter). Maintain backward compatibility and provide clear deprecation timelines. Document breaking changes and migration paths.
Create comprehensive API documentation with OpenAPI/Swagger specifications. Include examples, error codes, authentication details, and interactive testing capabilities.
Implement comprehensive API testing including contract tests, integration tests, and consumer-driven contract testing. Use tools like Postman, Newman, or Pact for API validation.
Implement robust third-party API integration with retry logic, circuit breakers, timeouts, and fallback mechanisms. Handle rate limits and implement proper error handling for external dependencies.
